title: 845. Evaluating Offensive Linemen + Sean McVay & Dan Campbell as Leaders
itunes:title: 845. Evaluating Offensive Linemen + Sean McVay & Dan Campbell as Leaders
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode of Move the Sticks. To start off, the guys react to the news of Steelers QB Mitchell Trubisky being named the Steelers starting QB for the team's preseason opener. Then, the pair do a deep dive into the offensive line position and specifically, how teams can get great value in the draft by going with a consistent offensive lineman. To wrap up the show, the duo look at the leadership traits of Rams head coach Sean McVay and Lions head coach Dan Campbell.


Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
